column1: You want to find a moderately priced restaurant and it should serve bistro food. If there is no such venue how about british type of food. Make sure you get the phone number.
You are looking for a moderately priced restaurant and it should be in the south part of town. You want to know the address and postcode.
You are looking for a cheap restaurant and it should serve indian food. Make sure you get the phone number and address of the venue.
You want to find a restaurant in any area and it should serve seafood. Make sure you get the address and phone number.
You are looking for a restaurant in the west part of town and it should serve vietnamese food. Make sure you get the phone number and postcode.
You are looking for an expensive restaurant and it should be in the east part of town. You want to know the address and phone number.
You are looking for a restaurant in the west part of town and it should serve spanish food. If there is no such venue how about italian type of food. Make sure you get the phone number of the venue.

You want to find a restaurant in the west part of town and it should serve chinese food. If there is no such venue how about british type of food. You want to know the address, phone number, and price range of the venue.

You are looking for a restaurant in the south part of town and it should serve european food. If there is no such venue how about centre area. Make sure you get the phone number and postcode of the venue.
You are looking for a cheap restaurant and it should serve asian food. If there is no such venue how about asian oriental type of food. You want to know the address and phone number.
